#include <stdio.h>
#include <string>
#include <algorithm>
#include <math.h>
#include <iostream>
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define lli long long int
using namespace std;

int main() {
    lli t,count=1;
    scanf ("%lld",&t);
    while (t--)
    {
        int n;
        scanf ("%d",&n);
        int a[n];
        for (int i=0;i<n;i++)
            scanf ("%d",&a[i]);
        sort (a,a+n);
        int sum=a[n-1]+a[n-2]+a[n-3];
        cout<<"Case "<<count<<": "<<sum<<endl;
        count++;
    }
	return 0;
}
